builtinPromptsDescription: Customize the system and user prompts for built-in tools like Translate, Polish, Academic, Summary, and Grammar. Use {language} for the target language placeholder and {text} for the selected text placeholder.
emptySubtitle: Select text in your document and ask me anything
emptySubtitleExcel: Select cells in your spreadsheet and ask me anything
emptyTitle: How can I help you today?
excelClean_tooltip: Clean and organize your selected data.
excelBeautify_tooltip: Apply professional formatting to your cells.
excelTransform_tooltip: Transform your data according to your instructions.
excelFormula_tooltip: The AI will generate an Excel formula tailored to your request.
excelToolsDescription: Tools that AI agents can use to interact with your Excel spreadsheet.
excelTool_addWorksheet_desc: Add a new worksheet to the workbook.
excelTool_applyAutoFilter_desc: Apply auto filter to the selected range.
excelTool_autoFitColumns_desc: Auto-fit column widths to match content.
excelTool_clearRange_desc: Clear contents or formatting from a range.
excelTool_createChart_desc: Create a chart from selected data.
excelTool_formatRange_desc: Apply formatting to cells (colors, fonts, borders).
excelTool_getCellFormula_desc: Get the formula from a cell.
excelTool_getWorksheetData_desc: Get all data from the active worksheet.
excelTool_getWorksheetInfo_desc: Get information about the active worksheet.
excelTool_insertFormula_desc: Insert an Excel formula at a cell.
excelTool_searchAndReplace_desc: Search and replace values in the worksheet.
excelTool_setCellValue_desc: Write a value to a specific cell.
excelTool_setColumnWidth_desc: Set the width of a column.
excelTool_setRowHeight_desc: Set the height of a row.
excelTool_sortRange_desc: Sort selected data by a column.
proofread_tooltip: Select text first. The AI will proofread for grammar, spelling, agreements, structure, and provide suggestions via comments.
translate_tooltip: Select text first. The AI will translate the text into the configured language.
polish_tooltip: Select text first. The AI will polish and refine the tone of your text.
academic_tooltip: Select text first. The AI will rewrite your text to meet academic standards.
summary_tooltip: Select text first. The AI will generate a concise summary of the selected text.
pptBullets_tooltip: Select a paragraph or shape. The AI will convert the text into concise bullet points.
pptPunchify_tooltip: Select text. The AI will rewrite it to be short, punchy, and suitable for a presentation.
pptSpeakerNotes_tooltip: Select slide text. The AI will write detailed speaker notes.
pptShrink_tooltip: Select slide text. The AI will shorten it while keeping the main points.
pptVisual_tooltip: Select slide text. The AI will generate a prompt to visually illustrate the concept.
imageSelectionTooShort: Please select at least 5 words to define the image theme.
imageGenerationPrompt: Generate a professional, modern, and clean illustration (minimalist or flat vector style) ideal for a corporate presentation, representing the following text: "{text}"
imageInsertWordOnly: For images, direct insertion is available in Word. The image was copied to the clipboard.
newChatConfirm: This will clear the current conversation. Continue?
noModelResponse: The model returned an empty response. Try again or check the backend logs.
toolsExecutedSuccessfully: Actions completed successfully. Check the document for changes.
recursionLimitExceeded: Agent exceeded the maximum number of iterations.
responseTruncated: The response was truncated by the token limit. Try increasing the limit or refining the request.
wordToolsDescription: Tools that AI agents can use to interact with your Word document.
wordTool_appendText_desc: Append text to the end of the document.
wordTool_clearFormatting_desc: Clear all formatting from selected text.
wordTool_setParagraphFormat_desc: Set paragraph alignment, spacing, and indentation.
wordTool_getDocumentHtml_desc: Get the full document body as HTML.
wordTool_modifyTableCell_desc: Replace content in a table cell.
wordTool_addTableRow_desc: Add rows to an existing table.
wordTool_addTableColumn_desc: Add columns to an existing table.
wordTool_deleteTableRowColumn_desc: Delete rows or columns from a table.
wordTool_formatTableCell_desc: Format a specific table cell (background and font).
wordTool_insertHeaderFooter_desc: Insert text into document header or footer.
wordTool_insertFootnote_desc: Insert a footnote at the current selection.
wordTool_addComment_desc: Add a review comment to the current selection.
wordTool_getComments_desc: Read existing comments from the document.
wordTool_setPageSetup_desc: Change margins, orientation, and paper size.
wordTool_getSpecificParagraph_desc: Read a specific paragraph by index.
wordTool_insertSectionBreak_desc: Insert a section break at the cursor.
excelTool_getConditionalFormattingRules_: Read conditional formatting rules from a range or worksheet used range.
excelTool_batchSetCellValues_desc: Set values for multiple individual cells in a single operation. Much more efficient than repeated setCellValue.
excelTool_batchProcessRange_desc: Write a 2D array of values to a contiguous range in one operation.
excelTool_applyConditionalFormatting_des: Create conditional formatting rules (cell value, text, custom formula, color scales, data bars, icon sets).
wordTool_applyTaggedFormatting_desc: Convert inline tags (e.g., <format>text</format>) into formatted Word text.
outlookReplyPrePrompt: Briefly describe what you want to reply:
emptySubtitleOutlook: Open an email and let me help you draft replies, summarize, or extract tasks
pptVisualPrefix: Generate an image prompt for a slide about:
emptySubtitlePowerPoint: Select text in a slide and let me help you create impactful presentations
selectSlideTextPrompt: Please select text inside a shape first
excelTool_addDataValidation_desc: Apply data validation rules (dropdowns, limits, formulas).
excelTool_createTable_desc: Convert a range into a structured Excel table.
excelTool_copyRange_desc: Copy values/formulas/number formats to another range.
excelTool_removeAutoFilter_desc: Remove the current worksheet auto filter.
excelTool_activateWorksheet_desc: Switch to another worksheet by name.
excelTool_getDataFromSheet_desc: Read data from another worksheet without activating it.
excelTool_freezePanes_desc: Freeze/unfreeze rows, columns, or an anchor pane.
excelTool_addHyperlink_desc: Insert a clickable hyperlink in cells.
excelTool_addCellComment_desc: Add a comment to a cell.
excelTool_setNamedRange_desc: Create or update a named range.
powerpointToolsDescription: Tools that AI agents can use to interact with your PowerPoint presentation.
powerpointTool_getSelectedText_desc: Get the currently selected text in PowerPoint.
powerpointTool_replaceSelectedText_desc: Replace the currently selected text in PowerPoint.
powerpointTool_getSlideCount_desc: Get the total number of slides in the active presentation.
powerpointTool_getSlideContent_desc: Read all text content from a specific slide.
powerpointTool_addSlide_desc: Add a new slide to the presentation.
powerpointTool_setSlideNotes_desc: Set speaker notes for a specific slide (PowerPointApi 1.4+).
powerpointTool_insertTextBox_desc: Insert a text box into a slide with optional position and size.
powerpointTool_insertImage_desc: Insert a base64 image into a slide with optional position and size.
powerpointTool_deleteSlide_desc: Delete a specific slide by its number.
powerpointTool_getShapes_desc: Get all shapes on a specific slide with their properties.
powerpointTool_deleteShape_desc: Delete a shape from a slide by its ID or Name.
powerpointTool_setShapeFill_desc: Set the fill color of a shape on a slide.
powerpointTool_moveResizeShape_desc: Move and/or resize a shape on a slide.
powerpointTool_getAllSlidesOverview_desc: Get a text overview of all slides in the presentation.
outlookToolsDescription: Tools that AI agents can use to interact with your Outlook email.
outlookTool_getEmailBody_desc: Read the full body of the current email.
outlookTool_getSelectedText_desc: Read selected text in the email compose window.
outlookTool_setEmailBody_desc: Replace the full email body with plain text.
outlookTool_insertTextAtCursor_desc: Insert plain text at the current cursor position.
outlookTool_setEmailBodyHtml_desc: Replace the full email body with HTML content.
outlookTool_setEmailSubject_desc: Update the email subject in compose mode.
outlookTool_getEmailRecipients_desc: Read To/Cc/Bcc recipients of the current email.
outlookTool_addRecipient_desc: Add one or more recipients to To, Cc, or Bcc.
outlookTool_getEmailSender_desc: Read sender information for the current email.
outlookTool_getEmailDate_desc: Read the email creation date/time when available.
outlookTool_getAttachments_desc: List attachments from the current email.
outlookTool_insertHtmlAtCursor_desc: Insert formatted HTML at the current cursor position.
imageClipboardNotSupported: Unable to copy the image: clipboard image writing is not supported in this environment.
imageInsertExcelNotSupported: Image insertion is not supported in Excel add-ins. Please use Word or PowerPoint.
credentialsRequired: Please configure your credentials in Settings > Account to use this feature.
